description: Structor är ett av Sveriges ledande kunskapsföretag inom planering, projektering och genomförande av projekt inom hus, industri, infrastruktur, samhälle, energi och miljö. Vi förverkligar idéer och utvecklar projekt tillsammans med våra kunder. Structor består av specialistbolag med gemensamma värderingar och finns representerade i större delen av landet. Inom Structor har vi alltid behov av duktiga och engagerade människor. Som medarbetare hos oss kommer du att verka i en kompetent och kreativ organisation med stor frihet under eget ansvar. Dina möjligheter till utveckling och intressanta arbetsuppgifter är mycket stora. Vill du arbeta som konsult hos oss besök vår monter på Armada!

name: Svenska Kraftnät
description: Svenska Kraftnät arbetar på uppdrag av regeringen och utvecklar och förvaltar stamnätet för el som omfattar ledningar för 400 kV och 220 kV med stationer och utlandsförbindelser. I våra kontrollrum ser vi till att det alltid är balans mellan produktion och förbrukning av el i Sverige. Vi har totalt 570 anställda och de senaste fem åren har vi rekryterat 350 nya medarbetare. Svenska Kraftnät har en tydlig värdegrund som bygger på utveckling, ansvar, effektivitet och tydlighet. Just nu bygger vi ut stamnätet för att möta framtidens högre elförbrukning och krav på säkra elleveranser. Det betyder att vi behöver anställa fler kompetenta medarbetare som drivs av ett engagemang för vårt uppdrag.

name: Sveriges Ingenjörer
description: Sveriges Ingenjörer är fackförbundet och intresseorganisationen för dig som studerar till ingenjör. Vi är Sveriges största nätverk för ingenjörer och har ca 139 000 ingenjörsmedlemmar.\nSom studerandemedlem erbjuder vi dig individuell rådgivning och service med allt från att granska ditt CV till hjälp med intervjuteknik och löneförhandling. Hos oss kan du söka stipendium, delta i tävlingar och ta del av landets bästa lönestatistik. Förutom det erbjuder vi karriärrådgivning, tidningen Ny Teknik och Ingenjören, aktiviteter som hålls över hela landet och mycket mer.

name: Sweco
description: Swecos engineers, architects and environmental experts are working together to develop total solutions that contribute to the creation of a sustainable society. We call it sustainable engineering and design. We make it possible for our clients to carry out their projects not only with high quality and good economy but also with the best possible conditions for sustainable development. Sweco delivers qualified consulting services with high knowledge content throughout the client’s project chain, from feasibility studies, analyses and strategic planning to engineering, design and project management.

name: Swerea AB
description: The Swerea Group creates commercial benefits for its members and customers by developing, refining and communicating new research results within the following areas: material technology, process technology, production technology and product development. This improves the overall competitiveness and innovativeness of Swedish industry. The Swerea Group, which comprises around 550 employees. Operations are conducted in five research institutes (Swerea IVF, Swerea KIMAB, Swerea MEFOS, Swerea SICOMP and Swerea SWECAST).\nThe Group has operations in Jönköping, Linköping, Luleå, Mölndal, Piteå, Stockholm, Brest and St Etienne, France.

name: Syntronic Group
description:
Syntronic is an engineering design house specializing in the design and development of electronics, mechanics, embedded and administrative software as well as test development. We have our own local manufacturing site for prototype and volume production. This makes it possible for us to deliver from idea to complete system.

We are a Swedish owned company located in Kista, Linköping, Göteborg, Lund, Gävle, Sandviken, China, Canada, Malaysia, Indonesia, UK... Since we are a global, our engineers are used to work international.

We love:  RF, PCB layout, simulations, embedded, thermal, digital/analog, mechanical, JAVA/C/C++/C#/Pearl..., Linux, RTOS, test development, ARM, FPGA, ASIC etc.

name: Systecon
description: Systecon is a leading provider of consulting services and decision support software tools for systems Life Cycle Management and Integrated Logistics Support. We help our customers establish solutions that enable higher productivity, better availability and higher safety in the most cost effective way from a life cycle perspective. Systecon’s software Opus Suite is the choice of hundreds of companies worldwide when it comes to analysis support of large and technically complex systems.

name: TeliaSonera
description:
TeliaSonera provides network access and telecommunication services that help people and companies communicate in an easy, efficient and environmentally friendly way.
Founded in the 1850’s we are pioneers of the telecom industry, one of the inventors of mobile communications and founders of GSM. We are committed to continue to drive the information society and to constantly take our customers one step further. We have evolved from local operators into Europe’s fifth largest – in less than 20 years.
 International strength combined with local excellence is what makes us truly unique - and provides a world class customer experience, all the way from the Nordic countries to Nepal. This combination has brought groundbreaking 4G, a world class fiber network, and introduced 3G at Mount Everest.
Build your career in a future driven company that offer services in the Nordic and Baltic countries, the emerging markets of Eurasia, including Russia and Turkey, and in Spain. A company that serves millions of customers in 20 countries, every day, through our networks and services.

name: Tetra Pak
description: Tetra Pak is the world's leading company for food processing and packaging solutions. Working closely with our customers and suppliers, we provide safe, innovative and environmentally sound products that each day meet the needs of hundereds of millions of people. With more than 23 000 employees based in over 85 countries, we believe in responsible industry leadership and a sustainable approach to business. Our motto, PROTECTS WHAT'S GOOD, reflects our vision to make food safe and available, everywhere. Our core values form the foundation for our company and shapes the Tetra Pak culture which flows through all levels and each individual in our organization.

name: Tieto
description:
Are you looking for a career with a company that both challenges and cares? Welcome to Tieto. We are committed to developing enterprises and society through information technology. We believe in openness, independent thinking and in giving our people the freedom to be their exceptional selves.\n\nWe are the largest Nordic IT services company providing full lifecycle services for both private and public sectors. Our work puts us at the frontline of a wide range of industries. Today we are a team of more than 14,000 technology professionals in 20 countries.
Visit us at our events and in our stand at Armada and we´ll tell you more about what we do at Tieto and opportunities to become one of us.

name: Trafikverket
description: Are you a creative community developer?\nWe are responsible for the longterm planning of the infrastructure for the entire transport system - for road, rail, air and sea. We offer over 150 different professions – an impressive common knowledge base. As we are such a broad organization with many different fields of activity, we can offer you great opportunities to develop or change jobs internally. You will never stagnate with us – you will be the driving force behind how your career progresses.

name: Trimble AB
description: The engineers at R&D has competencies in electronics, mechanics, optics, software and production engineering, working with functions as distance and angle measurements, tracking, imaging and scanning. The environment is innovative and highly international with close collaborations with other Trimble sites around the world.\nOperations in Danderyd is a dynamic and modern work place with motivated professionals who love to work in a high performance environment..\nThe high-tech products from Trimble Danderyd are made by specialists in commodity management, supplier development and quality assurance, production engineering and planning, logistics, manufacturing and leadership.

name: Unilever
description: Unilever’s mission is to add Vitality to Life. We meet everyday needs for nutrition, hygiene & personal care with brands that help people feel good, look good & get more out of life. Our products touch the lives of 2 billion people every day. Unilever’s purpose is to meet the everyday needs of people everywhere – to anticipate the aspirations of our consumers and customers & to respond creatively and competitively with branded products and services, which raise the quality of life. As our business grows, so do our responsibilities. We have therefore committed to developing new ways of doing business that will allow us to double the size of our company while reducing our environmental impact.

name: Visma
description: Visma is Scandinavia’s leading professional environment in the fields of finance and IT. Here you will be part of a unique working environment where you work amongst experts across both topical and geographical borders.  We offer the opportunity to work in an entrepreneurial company, with power and development opportunities in a strong group. With us, you enjoy that puts performance and business value before prestige and want to work in a growing company where your contribution makes a difference. We give you as an employee scope for innovation and proactivity, the opportunity to grow and develop, and a balance in life where you as an employee have space to take responsibility.

name: WSP
description:
WSP is one of the world’s leading engineering and design consultancies. We provide services to transform the built environment and restore the natural environment.

We have 17 000 employees, based in more than 300 offices, across 30 countries, on every continent.

WSP Sweden is a nationwide consultancy, around 2,500 staff. Though we are united by our shared pride, passion and desire to collaborate, we have very different areas of expertise, specialism and innovation.

name: Xylem
description:
Vi är 12 900 anställda som finns representerade i fler än 150 länder, vilket ger dig stora möjligheter till ett intressant jobb.

Förutom stor geografisk spridning, med projekt över hela världen, har vi ett antal olika arbetsområden som gör Xylem till ett mångsidigt företag. Forskning och utveckling, affärsutveckling, IT, ekonomi och marknadsföring/information, produktion och sälj är några av dessa.

Förändringar och miljöombyte är viktigt för att man ska trivas på jobbet. Hos oss är det väldigt vanligt att våra anställda byter tjänst internt, och eftersom vi är ett globalt företag finns stora möjligheter till utlandstjänst.

name: Quinyx
description:
Quinyx is a premier web-based solution that enables customers to schedule, report time and dynamically forecast optimal labour costs against sales. The solution is especially designed for labour intensive industries and has been appointed by the GSEA in Chicago for "Best Innovation 2007". Today, Quinyx has over 100,000 users in seven countries with customers such as McDonald’s, SSP The Travel Food Experts, FedEx, Compass Group, Burger King, and Decathlon. In 2013 Quinyx was nominated as a Gasellföretag (Gazelle company) by Sweden’s largest business magazine Dagens Industri and ranked as the second fastest growing IT company in Sweden with a growth rate of 589 percent between 2009 and 2012. 
 
Our business model has an enormous potential and we are driven by providing our customers the best possible support that will enable them to do what they do even better. The organization is still young but is growing at a rapid pace and Quinyx is now made up of c. 65 driven and enthusiastic professionals.

name: ABB
description: ABB is a leader in power and automation technologies that enable utility and industry customers to improve performance while lowering environmental impact. The ABB Group of companies operates in around 100 countries and employs about 145,000 people.
